title: Constantly Freezing, has become useless
content:
All of a sudden my Pixel 1 has become useless.  It started a couple days ago where when attempting to answer a phone call my entire phone would freeze to a point where a hard restart was required (holding power button for 30 seconds).

Now it happens all the time regardless of activity.  I've attempted Safe Mode, I've done a factory restart and installed little applications back, etc.

I've also attempted the fixes I found on here about Device Health Services and Digital Well Being with no luck at all.
